events.title: Bike Repair Class
events.location: La Plaza Community Garden - 9th St & Ave C, LES
events.description: Learn how to fix your bike and take care of basic maintenance and tune-ups. This is a class, so no need to bring your bike - just come ready to learn.

events.title: Fix Your Own Bike Workshop
events.location: Time's Up! - 626 E 14th St between Ave B & C, Manhattan
events.description: Open shop time: use our tools and stands to work on your bike with experienced volunteer mechanics on hand to coach and answer questions.

events.title: Thursday Night Bike Ride
events.location: Meet at the Columbus Circle entrance to Central Park
events.description: Hosted by Social Cycling NYC, this weekly ride welcomes new riders and seasoned commuters for a friendly spin through the city.

events.title: Halloween Critical Mass - Manhattan
events.description: Celebrate renewable energy and people-powered transportation with a costumed Critical Mass ride. Bring your best Halloween look and ride for a greener future.

events.title: Future Positive New Year's Eve Ride
events.location: Time's Up! Annual Ride - Multiple meetups & Belvedere Castle finale
events.description: Bike or skate into the new year with Time's Up! Meet at 9:45 pm (Williamsburg Bridge, Brooklyn side), 10:00 pm (Washington Square Park Arch), or 10:20 pm (Madison Square Park). Ride to Belvedere Castle for a joyous outdoor after-party with fireworks and dancing. Volunteers needed for ride leaders, so bring festive noisemakers!
